name: サーリャ - Tharja / Fire Emblem Awakening - ファイアーエムブレム覚醒
description:
N°36 Release, サーリャ - Tharja From Fire Emblem Awakening - ファイアーエムブレム覚醒.

You can now request a Character's LORA. CLICK HERE

Put everything in Filter for seeing all images!

Click on Show more for Weight & Trigger recommendation, Also click on About This Version at Right Corner for more Info.

Character's request, And i wanted one at the Best Quality possible, so i created it, Honestly the Quality output is Insane.

About this Lora:

  • Lora trained on 154+ Images, That i sorted manually, At the Max Quality Possible (Orginal Art 4K + Official Art 4K) SFW+NFSW.

  • Trained at 768x Resolution for maximum Detail & Quality.

  • NAI Used, Work with Majority of the Anime Model's.

  • Flexibility is Very Good, can work at 1 dependings of the alternate outfit.

  • Insane Quality Output.

  • Work's greatly with Detail Tweaker Lora. (I Recommend to use it).

  • Can probably do Tharja in Realistic Cosplay.

For Prompts & Weight:

About Trigger Words & Prompts: TharjaV4 (For Trigger) & for prompts just refer to examples images & you can put any prompts you want.

Weight recommended: 0.6-1. - Best Result 0.7-1.

Leave a Review & Share you're image in comments if you appreciate this Work :).
tags: ファイアーエムブレム覚醒
ファイアーエムブレム

modelVersions.name: V4
modelVersions.description:
I pruned Black Hair, Purple Eyes, so normally you don't need to put in prompt, but if they don't appear put: ((Black Hair, Purple Eyes)) prompt.

For Official Default Skin: Sometime the best weights is varying per model's, Like 0.7-1.

For Flexibility: for like clothes that don't exist put 0.6 - 1 Weight, See my Examples images for this. (Dependings of the outfit it's can work at 0.9 - 1).

Also if you don't want something to appear, put it in Negative Prompt.

meta.negativePrompt: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), (monochrome:1.1), (zombie, sketch, interlocked fingers, comic), (negative_hand-neg), EasyNegative
